001package com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.request.currentStatus;
002
003import org.apache.commons.lang3.Validate;
004import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.Message;
005import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType;
006import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.annotations.MessageProps;
007import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.helpers.Bytes;
008import com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus.ApiVersionResponse;
009
010/**
011 * Returns the major and minor API version of the pump.
012 *
013 * When the Android libary is used, this message is invoked automatically by PumpX2 on connection
014 * with the pump so that the state can be tracked globally via PumpState.getPumpAPIVersion.
015 * Due to this, if called explicitly via the Android library, a callback will not be returned.
016 */
017/**
018 * Returns the major and minor API version of the pump.
019 *
020 * When the Android libary is used, this message is invoked automatically by PumpX2 on connection
021 * with the pump so that the state can be tracked globally via PumpState.getPumpAPIVersion.
022 * Due to this, if called explicitly via the Android library, a callback will not be returned.
023 *
024
025 *
026 * <br>
027 *
028 * Request message for {@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus.ApiVersionResponse}, opCode 32, size 2
029 *
030 * <br>
031 *
032 * 
033 * <table border='1'>
034 * <caption>Message properties:</caption>
035 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>opCode</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>32</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
036 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>size</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>2</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
037 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>variableSize</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>true</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
038 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>type</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.MessageType#REQUEST}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
039 * <tr><th>&nbsp;<code>response</code>&nbsp;</th><td>&nbsp;<code>{@link com.jwoglom.pumpx2.pump.messages.response.currentStatus.ApiVersionResponse}</code>&nbsp;</td></tr>
040 * </table>
041 */@MessageProps(
042    opCode=32,
043    size=2, // or 0
044    variableSize=true,
045    type=MessageType.REQUEST,
046    response=ApiVersionResponse.class
047)
048public class ApiVersionRequest extends Message {
049    public ApiVersionRequest() {
050        this.cargo = EMPTY;
051    }
052
053    public ApiVersionRequest(byte[] cargo) {
054        this.cargo = cargo;
055    }
056
057    public void parse(byte[] raw) {
058        // empty cargo is ok
059        if (raw.length == 0) return;
060
061        Validate.isTrue(raw.length == props().size(), "got length "+raw.length);
062        this.cargo = Bytes.dropFirstN(raw, 3);
063    }
064}
